tokens.text: validates format_version fields across JSON definition files

title: Format Version
description: Validates format_version fields across various Minecraft JSON definition files including block types, item types, recipes, animations, and animation controllers. Compares versions against the current Minecraft version and can update them to the latest.
technicalDescription: Topic IDs follow a pattern where each file type has a base offset. Within each offset: +0 = undefined, +2 = major low, +4 = major high, +6 = minor low, +8 = minor high, +10 = patch low, +12 = patch high. Topic IDs 600+ report format version info (info type) as 600 + ProjectItemType.

fields.title: Format Undefined
fields.description: Checks that a format_version field is defined in the JSON definition file.

fields.title: Block Major Low
fields.description: The block type format_version major version is lower than the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: Block Major High
fields.description: The block type format_version major version is higher than the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: Block Minor Low
fields.description: The block type format_version minor version is lower than the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: Version Retrieval Failed
fields.description: Internal error: Could not retrieve the latest Minecraft version from the database.

fields.title: Version Parse Failed
fields.description: Internal error: Could not parse a version string into version components.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the version string that failed to parse.
